translation.en: -Ew! [laughs] -It was glazed. It was horrible.

translation.en: I think he had a nosebleed. Oh, my God, you're messing with me.

translation.en: I think he was bleeding all over the sidewalk

translation.en: and people were keeping away from him.

translation.en: You're totally lying to me.

translation.en: -No, I'm pretty sure that's what happened. -Uh-huh.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yes, I think so.

translation.en: -Why didn't you tell me? -I am telling you.

translation.en: Well, yeah, thanks. Like, five years later.

translation.en: I didn't know that you liked him. You really liked him?

translation.en: Yes.

translation.en: -I feel like you're wrong anyways. -No, I'm not.

translation.en: -You're in TV, right? -Yeah.

translation.en: -You are so good in that. -Oh, thank you.

translation.en: And so nice. Do you mind if I get your autograph?

translation.en: Here's a fountain pen. I hope you like it.

translation.en: This is my friend, Anna. She's also an actress.

translation.en: [gasps] Have I seen you in anything?

translation.en: No, I would be surprised.

translation.en: -I am just blown away by this. -[Beth] There you are.

translation.en: Do you mind if I take a photo?

translation.en: I'm, like, just so excited about this, I can't even tell you.

translation.en: It's right there.

translation.en: Thank you.

translation.en: -Thank you. [chuckles] -Sure.

translation.en: Okay, one, two, three.

translation.en: she turned the office into a guest room, so that my cousin could stay with her.

translation.en: [Beth] Oh, nice.

translation.en: -[Beth] Great. Perfect. -[Anna] Better, right?

translation.en: -[Beth] Yeah, lovely. -[Anna] Yeah, it's way better.

translation.en: It's beautiful, huh?

translation.en: The view.

translation.en: Still don't get any reception, huh?

translation.en: The one whose short I did that went to Sundance?

translation.en: Well, he sent me this feature script he's been working on.

translation.en: He really wanted me to show it to this producer
translation.zh: 他很想让我把它给

translation.en: on that movie I shot last June.

translation.en: Thanks.

translation.en: Oh, so I told him that I didn't have a chance to show the producers, you know.

translation.en: You've been on set all week."

translation.en: And I was like, "Yeah, but the producers aren't even there every day."

translation.en: I don't know. I just feel like he expects so much from me,

translation.en: and I'm just getting my feet wet, you know?

translation.en: to participate in the conversation in the first place.

translation.en: Right?

translation.en: I mean, Jesus, if I was a boy, no one would be telling me to calm down.

translation.en: True.

translation.en: Oh, come on, Beth. Has anyone ever told you to calm down in your life?

translation.en: [scoffs] Exactly.

translation.en: Anyways, yeah, so I could feel myself getting, like, really upset,

translation.en: but I stopped myself because I was like, no, no,

translation.en: And he was like, "Yeah, yeah, yeah.

translation.en: -[gasps] Oh, my God. -Like, what?

translation.en: I just feel so out of control.

translation.en: No.

translation.en: No, no, that's really frustrating, what happened to you.

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.en: and he's letting me stay at the house until he gets back,

translation.en: but after that, I'm like…

translation.en: No, you know what? [sighs]

translation.en: I don't know. [clears throat]

translation.en: Henry's thinking was like, career is important,

translation.en: but if you're in a relationship, then you have to put that first, right?

translation.en: But, like, I always knew that I just wasn't gonna be happy

translation.en: unless I accomplish certain things first.

translation.en: Like if you want to be an actress,

translation.en: you have to establish yourself before you're 30 or else you're fucked.

translation.en: Yeah, but I mean, it beats waiting tables.

translation.en: and stupid fucking invisible braces.

translation.en: [chuckling] Why?

translation.en: Because you almost just killed us like five times.

translation.en: -Come on. [chuckling] -Fine.

translation.en: Sazerac and Speaking in Tongues.

translation.en: Thank you.

translation.en: -Here, no, I can get this. -No, no, I got it. Can we keep it open?

translation.en: -I can pay for my own drink. -I know you can,

translation.en: but that stupid beer commercial I did
translation.zh: -我能付自己的那杯-我知道你能 但我拍的愚蠢的啤酒广告每天播出一百次

translation.en: is playing, like, a hundred times a day,
translation.zh: 但我拍的愚蠢的啤酒广告每天播出一百次

translation.en: and I'm making a lot of money and I want to buy my best friend a drink, okay?

translation.en: -Okay, thank you. -[both chuckle]

translation.en: -Cheers. -Cheers.

translation.en: I mean, you broke up with Henry what, like, two months ago,

translation.en: -What? -No, don't look.

translation.en: [Vic] The situation's pretty sticky over there.

translation.en: The Chinese actually held me for a couple of days on my last visit,

translation.zh: 我在大苏尔

translation.en: I can't seem to get in touch with Beth.
translation.zh: 我联系不上贝斯

translation.en: [Summer] My God, hi!
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: [giggling] It's so good to see you. Look at you.
translation.zh: 见到你真好 看看你！

translation.en: What is… what is this outfit?
translation.zh: 什么 这是什么造型？

translation.en: -[Jesse] It's my costume. -[Summer] It's beautiful. Hi.
translation.zh: -是我的装扮！-很漂亮 嗨

translation.en: Come on, come on in.
translation.zh: 快点 快进来

translation.en: But wait, I thought you were gonna be a pig.
translation.zh: 等等 我以为你要扮猪猪

translation.en: I got it at a thrift store. I am a pig. [Summer] You don't look like a pig.
translation.zh: -我在二手店买的 我是个猪猪-但你不像猪猪

translation.en: Wait, I'm a capitalist pig, hold on.
translation.zh: 等等 我是个资本家猪猪 等等

translation.en: No, you're like that handsome dude in a tux.
translation.zh: 不 你像个穿西服的帅哥

translation.en: [Jesse] No, no, no, I'm a capitalist pig. Look.
translation.zh: 不、不、不 我是个资本家猪猪 看

translation.en: -Now you get it? -You're a capitalist pig.
translation.zh: -看 现在看出来了？-好吧 你是资本家猪

translation.en: -I gotta… -I'm like a Rockefeller-type.
translation.zh: -等等 我得 等一下-我就像洛克菲勒那种

translation.en: -Joplin, come down and see Jesse. -I'm like a robber baron.
translation.zh: -乔普林 下来看看杰西！-我像个强盗贵族

translation.en: -Yeah, he's a pig. -Hi, Jesse.
translation.zh: -是 他是个猪猪！-嗨 杰西！

translation.en: [Jesse] Bring it in, my man.
translation.zh: 来吧 我的小伙子！

translation.en: Mom, can I get my costume on?
translation.zh: 妈妈 我能穿上我的装扮吗？

translation.en: [Summer] Yeah, if you're quick, I'm starving.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我能穿上我的装扮吗？ 好 好 但你要快点 我饿了

translation.en: [Jesse] Cool, let's do it. Don't give Jesse a hard time.
translation.zh: -好极了 换吧-别欺负杰西

translation.en: Oh, sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: -Okay, red is okay? -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 好的 红酒可以吗？

translation.en: So, how long have the two of you been going out for?
translation.zh: 你俩在一起多久了？

translation.en: Oh, we just met yesterday.
translation.zh: 我们昨天才认识

translation.en: Yeah? Has he painted your picture yet?
translation.zh: 是吗？他给你画画像了吗？

translation.en: -Oh, God, Jack! -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 天啊 杰克！

translation.en: [Summer] Don't listen to him.
translation.zh: 别听他胡说

translation.en: He's just jealous because Jesse brought such a pretty girl home
translation.zh: 他就是嫉妒因为杰西带了这么个美女回家

translation.en: and he's tired of me because I'm old.
translation.zh: 他烦我了 因为我老了

translation.en: -Yup. -[Jesse yelling]
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: [Jack] Shit! Holy crap!
translation.zh: 该死！天啊！

translation.en: -[Summer] Oh, my God! -Holy crap, it's Frankenstein!
translation.zh: -天啊！-天啊 是科学怪人！

translation.en: [Summer] Who let Frankenstein in the house?
translation.zh: 谁让科学怪人进来的？

translation.en: -Who let Frankenstein? Save me, save me! -[Joplin roaring]
translation.zh: 谁让科学怪人进来的？救我 救我！

translation.en: Oh, my God! Now, I'm gonna faint. Okay, can't breathe.
translation.zh: 天啊 现在 我要晕倒了好吧 无法呼吸了

translation.en: I can't, I can't. Oh, no, no, no. [coughing]
translation.zh: 我不能 我不能 不、不、不

translation.en: He's choking me!
translation.zh: 他要勒死我了！

translation.en: Wait, somebody, somebody.
translation.zh: 等等 来人 来人

translation.en: And I'm back from the dead,
translation.zh: 我又复活了

translation.en: and now I'm gonna kill you and then I'm gonna make you set the table.
translation.zh: 我现在要杀了你然后我要让你布置桌子

translation.en: Come on, help Mommy.
translation.zh: 快点 帮帮妈妈

translation.en: That's what happens to monsters who kill their mothers.
translation.zh: 这就是杀了他们母亲的怪兽的下场

translation.en: -Joplin. -[Joplin] Um…
translation.zh: 乔普林

translation.en: Thank you, universe, for your bounty, beauty, and your love.
translation.zh: 谢谢 宇宙谢谢你的慷慨 美丽 还有爱

translation.en: -[Jesse] Yeah. -[Summer] Yeah, that was really good.
translation.zh: -是啊-是啊 那真不错

translation.en: [Summer] Very nice.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Mm, so tell me, what's your deal? What's her deal?
translation.zh: -告诉我 你是干嘛的？-她是干嘛的？

translation.en: What? Is that a bad question?
translation.zh: 怎么了？那问题不能问？

translation.en: -[Jesse] A little bit. -I'm just trying to get to know the girl.
translation.zh: -有一点-我只是想了解这个女孩

translation.en: "The girl?" Now you're really putting your foot in it.
translation.zh: “女孩”？你真让人尴尬

translation.en: -It's fine. -[Jesse] She's a woman.
translation.zh: -没事-她是个女人

translation.en: Oh, my God, okay. The woman, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 天啊 好吧 女人 抱歉

translation.en: The last time I saw him, he was like, "Listen, man, I'm gonna become a monk."
translation.zh: 我上次见到他时 他说 “听着伙计 我要当和尚了”

translation.en: So, now you're here and my curiosity is piqued.
translation.zh: 现在你来这了 我很好奇

translation.en: -[Jack] Summer, lay off. -[Jesse] Yeah, dude.
translation.zh: -萨莫 别说了-是啊 伙计

translation.en: -What are you-- -Lay off.
translation.zh: -什么你们…-别说了

translation.en: Oh, my-- Lay off of what?
translation.zh: 我的天 别说什么？

translation.en: I'm trying to get to know her.
translation.zh: 我只是说 我只是想了解她

translation.en: What are you looking for, what information?
translation.zh: 你想知道什么 什么信息？

translation.en: I don't know, the basics.
translation.zh: 我不知道 就是基本情况

translation.en: -Just basics. -She's an actress.
translation.zh: -只是基本情况-她是个演员

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: [Jack] Summer used to be an actress.
translation.zh: 萨莫以前也是个演员

translation.en: It was another lifetime, I was really bad.
translation.zh: 上辈子的事了 糟透了

translation.en: [Jack] So? Acting is acting.
translation.zh: 所以呢？演戏就是演戏

translation.en: She used to do Shakespeare and everything. She was really good.
translation.zh: 她以前演莎士比亚 什么都会演她真的很棒

translation.en: Thank you. And you are next if you don't eat your food.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你要是不吃了 我一会就来亲你

translation.en: I'm sorry, that was sweet.
translation.zh: 对不起 那真贴心

translation.en: So do you like it, acting?
translation.zh: 你喜欢表演吗？

translation.en: Uh, I don't… Yeah, I guess. Yeah?
translation.zh: -我不…是的 我猜是-是吗？

translation.en: You must be really brave.
translation.zh: 你一定很勇敢

translation.en: No, I'm not brave.
translation.zh: 不 我不勇敢

translation.en: No, I think so.
translation.zh: 不 我想是的

translation.en: [Jack] Anybody want more wine?
translation.zh: 还有人想加点酒吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, I'll get it. -[Jesse] No, I'll get it.
translation.zh: -有 我去拿-不、不、不 我去

translation.en: -No, no, it's fine. -You sure?
translation.zh: -不、不 没事-你确定？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Out back on the cooler.
translation.zh: -对-在冷柜后面

translation.en: Do you ever feel like a whore?
translation.zh: 你有没有觉得自己像个妓女？

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Huh? Yeah.
translation.zh: -你还好吗？-没事

translation.en: Let me see, let me see.
translation.zh: 我看看 我看看

translation.en: -What happened? -[sighs]
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Does it really hurt?
translation.zh: 真的很疼吗？

translation.en: No, it's nothing, I think there was just some broken glass.
translation.zh: 不 没什么 我想只是些碎玻璃

translation.en: Here. -Thanks. -Does it hurt?
translation.zh: -过来-谢谢

translation.en: I'm gonna put some pressure on it.
translation.zh: 疼吗？我要用点力压

translation.en: No, no, it's okay.
translation.zh: 不 不 没事 没事

translation.en: I feel like I'm… not showing you a good time.
translation.zh: 我觉得你不开心

translation.en: I really wasn't expecting to like you this much.
translation.zh: 我真没想到会这么喜欢你

translation.en: When we first met, when I gave you a lift,
translation.zh: 我们第一次见面 我给你搭顺风车时

translation.en: I thought you were a snob, but for some reason
translation.zh: 我以为你是个势利的人但不知怎么了

translation.en: I just kept thinking about you.
translation.zh: 我一直在想你

translation.en: Then you came into the bar, and, uh…
translation.zh: 然后你走进了酒吧

translation.en: And I was glad.
translation.zh: 我很高兴

translation.en: I think you're really great.
translation.zh: 我觉得你真好

translation.en: I think you're soft and…
translation.zh: 我觉得你很温柔 而且…

translation.en: sweet.
translation.zh: 贴心

translation.en: I feel like you really understand me or something.
translation.zh: 我觉得你真的了解我

translation.en: [chuckles] But I feel like I could want that.
translation.zh: 我觉得我想要这种感觉

translation.en: You're just a really special person, Beth.
translation.zh: 你真是个特别的人 贝斯

translation.en: [Anna] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: You pretend to be so fucking helpless. But you're actually a fucking liar.
translation.zh: 你假装无助 但你其实是个大骗子

translation.en: What do you want from me?
translation.zh: 你想从我这得到什么？

translation.en: I bet you think you're better than me, huh? But you're not.
translation.zh: 我打赌你觉得你比我优秀 是吗？但才不是

translation.en: -You're phony. -[sobbing] Please leave!
translation.zh: -你很虚伪-请你走开！

translation.en: And you're self-obsessed, and you are a horrible fucking friend!
translation.zh: 你自以为是你是个糟糕透顶的朋友！

translation.en: Tell me what you want from me and I will be it.
translation.zh: 告诉我你想让我怎么样 我就怎么样

translation.en: I don't know what you want from me!
translation.zh: 我不知道你想让我怎么样！

translation.en: -[gasping] -That's right, cry. Cry, you fucking bitch. Please!
translation.zh: -对了 哭吧 哭吧 你这个贱人-求你！

translation.en: Fake fucking crocodile tears from a fake fucking Hollywood cunt.
translation.zh: 虚伪的鳄鱼的眼泪你这个好莱坞淫妇！

translation.en: Please, I just want to make you happy!
translation.zh: 求你 我只想让你高兴！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: [crying] No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: No, no.
translation.zh: 不 不！
